body_html: Sorry I don't know what whole archive is (does it mean that you enforce linking all of object files on the compiler, even if they're not used directly?). That would sound like a potential breakage, that's right. Watching the compiler and ensuring it doesn't remove particular sections sounds pretty fragile. Aren't their names going to be different in every ABI?

body: Sorry I don't know what whole archive is (does it mean that you enforce linking all of object files on the compiler, even if they're not used directly?). That would sound like a potential breakage, that's right. Watching the compiler and ensuring it doesn't remove particular sections sounds pretty fragile. Aren't their names going to be different in every ABI?
